answers.answer: Is your son already on insulin?  4.9% is a very normal reading.

question: my son is recently found gad antibody positive(227IU/ml) andHbA1C was 4.9% doctor told that its type 1 diabetes. i still can,t understand what is the reason for that because we both are not diebetic and our parents also not diebetic . i also want to know that if we think in future for second baby is there any possibility to her for diebetes?
title: diabetes type 1 in 1 yr old child
